description.name: eurterc20
description.tagline: EURt erc20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto erc20-eurt Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept EURt erc20 directly on your website
Unique erc20/eurt receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your erc20/eurt wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
